verses.text: Moreover \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* a \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and they \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* on the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* in their \w charges|strong="H4931"\w*, and \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* them to the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w taught|strong="H0995"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which were \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w Put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w build|strong="H1129"\w*; \add it shall\add* not \add be\add* a \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* upon \add your\add* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*: \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* now the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

And \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \add yourselves\add* by the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, after your \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*, according to the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and according to the \w writing|strong="H4385"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And stand \w in|strong="H5975"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* according to the \w divisions|strong="H6391"\w* of the \w families|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, and \add after\add* the \w division|strong="H2515"\w* of the \w families|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.\f + \fr 35.5 \ft the families of the fathers: Heb. the house of the fathers\f*\f + \fr 35.5 \ft the people: Heb. the sons of the people\f*

So \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, that \add they\add* may \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w gave|strong="H7311"\w* to the \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* and \w kids|strong="H1121"\w*, all for the passover \w offerings|strong="H6453"\w*, for all that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w*, to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H1241"\w*: these \add were\add* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w substance|strong="H7399"\w*.\f + \fr 35.7 \ft gave: Heb. offered\f*

And his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w gave|strong="H7311"\w* \w willingly|strong="H5071"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \w rulers|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* for the passover \w offerings|strong="H6453"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add small cattle\add*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*.\f + \fr 35.8 \ft gave willingly: Heb. offered, etc\f*

\w Conaniah|strong="H3562"\w* also, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* and \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w*, his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w* and \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w* and \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w gave|strong="H7311"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* for passover \w offerings|strong="H6453"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add small cattle\add*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*.\f + \fr 35.9 \ft gave: Heb. offered\f*

So the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* was \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w place|strong="H5977"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in their \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*, according to the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*.

And they \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \add the blood\add* from their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w flayed|strong="H6584"\w* \add them\add*.

And they \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, that they might \w give|strong="H5414"\w* according to the \w divisions|strong="H4653"\w* of the \w families|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. And so \add did they\add* with the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*.

And they \w roasted|strong="H1310"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* according to the \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w*: but the \add other\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add offerings\add* \w sod|strong="H1310"\w* they in \w pots|strong="H5518"\w*, and in \w caldrons|strong="H1731"\w*, and in \w pans|strong="H6745"\w*, and divided \add them\add* \w speedily|strong="H7323"\w* among all the \w people|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 35.13 \ft divided…: Heb. made them run\f*

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* they made \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* for themselves, and for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*: because the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \add were busied\add* in \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* of burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* until \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; therefore the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for themselves, and for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

And the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* \add were\add* in their \w place|strong="H4612"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, and \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, and \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*; and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* \add waited\add* at every \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; they might not \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*; for their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for them.\f + \fr 35.15 \ft place: Heb. station\f*

So all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, and to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, and the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 35.17 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

And there was no \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* to that \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; neither \w did|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* such a \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* as \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 35.18 \ft present: Heb. found\f*
In the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* was this \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ \w After|strong="H0310"\w* all this, when \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w Necho|strong="H5224"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Carchemish|strong="H3751"\w* by \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*: and \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* him.\f + \fr 35.20 \ft temple: Heb. house\f*

But he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w ambassadors|strong="H4397"\w* to him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What have I to do with thee, thou \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*? \add I come\add* not against thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* wherewith I have \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* me to make \w haste|strong="H0926"\w*: \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w* thee from \add meddling with\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who \add is\add* with me, that he \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* thee not.\f + \fr 35.21 \ft the house…: Heb. the house of my war\f*

Nevertheless \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* would not \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from him, but \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* himself, that he might \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with him, and \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Necho|strong="H5224"\w* from the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*.

And the \w archers|strong="H3384"\w* \w shot|strong="H3384"\w* at \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, Have me \w away|strong="H5674"\w*; for I am \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 35.23 \ft wounded: Heb. made sick\f*

His \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* therefore \w took|strong="H5674"\w* him out of that \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7392"\w* him in the \w second|strong="H4932"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* that he had; and they \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* him to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \add one of\add* the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*. And all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* for \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*.\f + \fr 35.24 \ft in one…: or, among the sepulchres\f*

¶ And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w lamented|strong="H6969"\w* for \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*: and all the singing \w men|strong="H7891"\w* and the singing \w women|strong="H7891"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* in their \w lamentations|strong="H7015"\w* to this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* them an \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w lamentations|strong="H7015"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, and his \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, according to \add that which was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,\f + \fr 35.26 \ft goodness: Heb. kindnesses\f*

And his \w deeds|strong="H1697"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
